messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] HR 2732
messages.msgSnippet: ... This list is not for discussion of political issues or concerns, but for unschooling discussion. However, the NHEN forums are available for those who wish
messages.messageBody:
On Nov 6, 2003, at 6:48 AM, piper1 wrote:

> Just wondering how folks are responding to the info provided in the
> last 2 issues of Home Education magazine, (sept-oct and nov-dec 2003,
> Vol 20, numbers 5 and 6,) regarding Federal Homeschool Legislation,
> proposed bill HR 2732? Any concerns, worries? Thanks, L.L.

This list is not for discussion of political issues or concerns, but
for unschooling discussion. However, the NHEN forums are available for
those who wish to read more and talk about these bills:
<http://www.nhen.org/forum/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=454&whichpage=9>.

NHEN is the one place where you can hear from both supporters and
detractors and then make up your own mind.

-pam sorooshian
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] HR 2732
messages.msgSnippet: ... Didn t we have a discussion that touched on some current legislation not too long ago? If no one wants to recap or can point to the beginning of the
messages.messageBody:
on 11/6/03 9:48 AM, piper1 at piper1@... wrote:

> Just wondering how folks are responding to the info provided in the last 2
> issues of Home Education magazine, (sept-oct and nov-dec 2003, Vol 20, numbers
> 5 and 6,) regarding Federal Homeschool Legislation, proposed bill HR 2732?
> Any concerns, worries? Thanks, L.L.

Didn't we have a discussion that touched on some current legislation not too
long ago?

If no one wants to recap or can point to the beginning of the thread, there
are HEM and NHEN sponsored lists where the politics of homeschooling is the
main focus. Check at:

http://www.nhen.org
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com
http://www.unschooling.com

Joyce

messages.subject: HR 2732
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Just wondering how folks are responding to the info provided in the last 2 issues of Home Education magazine, (sept-oct and nov-dec 2003, Vol 20, numbers 5
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
Just wondering how folks are responding to the info provided in the last 2 issues of Home Education magazine, (sept-oct and nov-dec 2003, Vol 20, numbers 5 and 6,) regarding Federal Homeschool Legislation, proposed bill HR 2732? Any concerns, worries? Thanks, L.L.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
